body_html:
I am also getting the same error on a Windows machine (I know you are still un-released), see specific details below. The error occurs when following setup instructions listed below, and then using runtime parameter one sequence.

PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines

We like to limit our issues to bug reports and feature requests. If you have a question or would like help and support, please visit our forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/

If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].

When submitting a bug report, please include the following information (where relevant):

PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
PyTorch version: 0.3.1.post2
How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90
Python version: python 3.6.4
CUDA/cuDNN version: V9.1.85
GPU models and configuration: Geforce GTX 1080 Ti FTW3 Hybrid
GCC version (if compiling from source): NA
CMake version: NA
Build command you used (if compiling from source): NA
Train and Validation Data: PyTorch Transfer Learning Tutorial Hymenoptera ImageNet Subset
Desired Transfer Learning Type: ConvNet as fixed feature extractor
Versions of any other relevant libraries:

  • conda 4.5.0
  • Anaconda 3

Steps to Reproduce:

  1. Download the Hymenoptera Data to DATA_DIR
  2. git clone https://github.com/pytorch/examples.git
  3. Enter one of the commands from the list below into the python command line.

Runtime Parameters:

  • Run one: python DATA_DIR --arch=inception_v3 --pretrained --b=256 main.py
  • Run two: python DATA_DIR --arch=inception_v3 --pretrained --b=10 main.py
  • Run three: python DATA_DIR --arch=inception_v3 --pretrained --b=256 --evaluate main.py

Execution Results:

  • Run one: RuntimeError Gist
  • Run two: RuntimeError Gist
  • Run three: RuntimeError Gist

I hope the provided information helps with debugging.

body:
I am also getting the same error on a Windows machine (I know you are still un-released), see specific details below. The error occurs when following setup instructions listed below, and then using runtime parameter one sequence. 

## PyTorch GitHub Issues Guidelines

We like to limit our issues to bug reports and feature requests. If you have a question or would like help and support, please visit our forums: https://discuss.pytorch.org/

If you are submitting a feature request, please preface the title with [feature request].

When submitting a bug report, please include the following information (where relevant):

PyTorch or Caffe2: PyTorch
OS: Windows 10 Home 64-bit
PyTorch version: 0.3.1.post2
How you installed PyTorch (conda, pip, source): `conda install -c peterjc123 pytorch cuda90`
Python version: python 3.6.4
CUDA/cuDNN version: V9.1.85
GPU models and configuration: Geforce GTX 1080 Ti FTW3 Hybrid 
GCC version (if compiling from source): NA
CMake version: NA
Build command you used (if compiling from source): NA
Train and Validation Data: [PyTorch Transfer Learning Tutorial Hymenoptera ImageNet Subset](https://download.pytorch.org/tutorial/hymenoptera_data.zip)
Desired Transfer Learning Type: [ConvNet as fixed feature extractor](http://pytorch.org/tutorials/beginner/transfer_learning_tutorial.html)
Versions of any other relevant libraries: 
* conda 4.5.0
* Anaconda 3

Steps to Reproduce:
1. Download the [Hymenoptera Data](https://download.pytorch.org/tutorial/hymenoptera_data.zip) to `DATA_DIR`
2. `git clone https://github.com/pytorch/examples.git`
3. Enter one of the commands from the list below into the python command line.

Runtime Parameters: 
* Run one: `python DATA_DIR --arch=inception_v3 --pretrained --b=256 main.py` 
* Run two: `python DATA_DIR --arch=inception_v3 --pretrained --b=10 main.py` 
* Run three: `python DATA_DIR --arch=inception_v3 --pretrained --b=256 --evaluate main.py`

Execution Results:
* Run one: [RuntimeError Gist](https://gist.github.com/ccampell/d703481f4d88fa6adadd8cafea427ee7)
* Run two: [RuntimeError Gist](https://gist.github.com/ccampell/5da5ad5f234729880a1d297522c53ced)
* Run three: [RuntimeError Gist](https://gist.github.com/ccampell/8ce1dc98a927eb51542b50d52f0df1e7)

I hope the provided information helps with debugging.
